Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-python, gfortran, bc, libarmci-mpi-dev (>= 0.3.1~beta-2~), libblas-dev, libglobalarrays-dev (>= 5.8.1-4~), liblapack-dev, libscalapack-mpi-dev (>= 2), libscalapack-mpich-dev (>= 2), libscalapack-openmpi-dev (>= 2), mpi-default-bin, mpi-default-dev, libmpich-dev, libopenmpi-dev, openssh-client, pkg-config, python3-dev, zlib1g-dev
Package-List: nwchem deb science optional arch=all nwchem-data deb science optional arch=all nwchem-mpich deb science optional arch=any nwchem-openmpi deb science optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: libatlas-base-dev, libblas.so.3, libblas3, libblis-dev, liblapack.so.3, liblapack3, libopenblas-dev
